channel.title: Obama on The Encryption Compendium
channel.description: Recent content in Obama on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: HTTPS-Everywhere for Government
item.description: Published: June 2015 URL: https://obamawhitehouse.archives.gov/blog/2015/06/08/https-everywhere-government Tags: 2010s HTTPS Obama Abstract: Today, the White House Office of Management and Budget (OMB) issued the HTTPS-Only Standard directive, requiring that all publicly accessible Federal websites and web services only provide service through a secure HTTPS connection.

item.title: Memorandum for the Heads of Executive Departments and Agencies: Policy to Require Secure Connections Across Federal Websites and Web Services
item.description: Authors: Scott, Tony Published: June 2015 Tags: 2010s HTTPS Obama
